Detailed Description

Base class for storage device filters.

Abstract class StorageDeviceFilter is the base class for storage device filter functors. Concrete filters have to override method Complies(). If a function or method requires a storage device filter to be passed as argument but you are interested in all storage devices then just pass the temporary object of an empty smart-pointer, i.e. StorageDeviceFilterPtr(0).
